thread.title: Career fairs are coming to San Antonio
thread.title_full: Career fairs are coming to San Antonio

author: Rosemary Terpolilli, San Antonio Business Spotlight Examiner
title: Career fairs are coming to San Antonio
text:
Career fairs are coming to San Antonio Use your key for the next article careers R. Terpolilli 
The kids may be getting ready for back-to-school but this may be the best time to look for career opportunities. There are a few job fairs coming to San Antonio this month and you have time to get your resume updated. 
Choice Career San Antonio Job Fair on August 13 will be held on that Thursday from 11 a.m. to 2 p.m. at the Norris Conference Center. The location is 618 NW Loop 410 at the Park North Shopping Center. You can register online before the event and get a VIP pass. The fair is free and there will be hiring managers from a variety of companies to meet. Some of the firms include Stevens Transport, J.B. Hunt and T-Mobile. Bring copies of your resume. 
Hire Live is sponsoring a job fair on Wednesday August 19 from 9 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at the Embassy Suites Hotel located at 10110 Highway 281 North, near the airport. They specialize in sale, retail and management career positions and they bring the companies and candidate together in an efficient networking forum. Be prepared for interview questions. 
National Career Fairs in holding a fair on August 20th from 11 a.m. to 2 p.m. at the Omni San Antonio Hotel located at 9821 Colonnade Blvd. Register for this free event online and upload your resume to get the maximum viewing by hiring managers. Some of the hiring companies include; AT&T, Kohl's, Primerica and New York Life. 
Good luck to all job seekers.
